About Me

Who I Am

I’m Diego Bergia, an electronics and automation enthusiast who loves building things that move, react, and interact. I enjoy experimenting with sensors, motors, and code to turn creative ideas into working prototypes.

What I Do

I develop interactive systems combining ESP32, Jetson Nano and 3D printing.
